title: Repli-seq Experiment
description: Genome-wide analysis of replication timing by next-generation sequencing.

dna_label.title: DNA label
dna_label.description: The tag or chemical used to label the newly replicated DNA - usually BrdU

labeling_time.title: Labeling time
labeling_time.description: Time in minutes of labeling pulse

cell_cycle_phase.title: Cell Cycle Phase
cell_cycle_phase.description: After sorting the cell cycle phase that the cell fraction falls in

stage_fraction.title: Cell Cycle Stage Fraction
stage_fraction.description: A decription of the sub stage prepared after sorting
stage_fraction.comment: Repliseq experiments can be 2-phase, 6-phase, 8-phase ... This field is used to further describe the fraction represented in this experiment

total_fractions_in_exp.title: Total number of fractions in the dataset that this experiment is part of.
total_fractions_in_exp.comment: If standard 2-stage early/late experiment the value should be 2, for higher res then total number of fractions

cell_sorting_protocol.title: Sorting Protocol
cell_sorting_protocol.description: Protocol with details on cell sorting by FACS
